item.title: Civil War Is Coming To Britain
item.description: Britain’s political leaders have lost all legitimacy, and the British people have the right to revolt against them in self-defense.

item.title: Wisconsin Judge Will Stand Trial On Charges Of Helping Illegal Alien Flee From ICE
item.description: Even a far-left federal judge isn't buying Milwaukee County Judge Hannah Dugan's claim she’s immune from criminal prosecution.

item.title: Colorado’s Zoning Tyrants Go To War Against A Christian-Owned French Bakery
item.description: Is it truly in the county’s best interest to destroy a thriving business and a cherished community hub simply to enforce its zoning ordinance?

item.title: Restoring Arlington Cemetery’s Reconciliation Monument Is Pivotal For American Greatness
item.description: The restoration of a monument in Arlington Cemetery may serve as the spiritual portal that brings America back to its origin in greatness.
